Package edu.sru.cpsc.webshopping.controller

Class MarketListingDomainController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.cpsc.webshopping.controller.MarketListingDomainController
@RestController public class MarketListingDomainController extends Object
A class for interacting with MarketListing items from the database

  • Method Details

    • getMarketListing

      @RequestMapping("/get-market-listing/{id}") public MarketListing getMarketListing(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Gets the MarketListing with an id matching the passed id
      Parameters:
      id - the ID to search for
      Returns:
      the MarketListing found, or null if no MarketListing with the passed id is found

    • getWidget

      @RequestMapping("/get-widget-by-name") public Widget getWidget(@PathVariable("name") String name)

    • getListingByWidget

      @RequestMapping("/get-listing-by-widget") public MarketListing getListingByWidget(@PathVariable("widget") Widget widget)

    • getAllListings

      @RequestMapping("/get-all-listings") public Iterable<MarketListing> getAllListings()
      Gets all MarketListings from the database
      Returns:
      an Iterable of all the database's MarketListings

    • marketListingPurchaseUpdate

      @PostMapping("/market-listing-purchase-update") public void marketListingPurchaseUpdate(@Validated MarketListing marketListing, int numPurchased)
      Updates the MarketListing associated with the passed marketListing to reflect a purchase This involves reducing the quantity available by the amount purchased
      Parameters:
      marketListing - the MarketListing to update
      numPurchased - the number of items purchased
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the MarketListing does not exist in the database, or is marked as deleted
      IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if the number purchased exceeds the quantity available

    • addMarketListing

      @PostMapping("/add-market-listing") public MarketListing addMarketListing(@Validated MarketListing marketListing)
      Creates a new MarketListing in the database
      Parameters:
      marketListing - the values of the new MarketListing
      result - form verification
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if result is invalid

    • addMarketListingSimple

      @PostMapping("/add-market-listing-simple") public MarketListing addMarketListingSimple(@Validated MarketListing marketListing)

    • editMarketListing

      @PostMapping("/edit-market-listing") public MarketListing editMarketListing(@Validated MarketListing updatedMarketListing)
      Updates an existing MarketListing to hold the values of the passed MarketListing The updated MarketListing is the one whose id matches the id of the updatedMarketListing
      Parameters:
      updatedMarketListing - a MarketListing holding the updated values

    • undoPurchase

      @PostMapping("undo-market-listing-purchase") public void undoPurchase(@Validated Transaction trans)
      Undos the changes caused by a purchase on the associated MarketListing
      Parameters:
      trans - The purchase to undo

    • getListingbyUser

      @GetMapping("get-Market-Listing-by-User") public MarketListing[] getListingbyUser(@Validated User user)

    • deleteMarketListing

      @PostMapping("/delete-market-listing/{id}") public void deleteMarketListing(@PathVariable long id)
      Deletes a MarketListing from the database
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the MarketListing to delete
